Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Murton Colliery, County Durham Promoted by Murton Colliery Prize B Prizes: £11 and trombone, £9, £4, £2 March contest: 1. Hartlepool Temperance, 2. Hartlepool Borough, 3. Consett. Best euphonium - Michael Hobday Consett). 6 bands competed.
April 29, 2012, 3 p.m. Sept. 7, 2016, 4:38 p.m.
